info.author: Nathan Urwin
info.description:
# setupmyos
Automate all the things

### Table of Contents
- [Features](#features)
  - [All OS](#all-os)
  - [Windows](#windows)
  - [macOS](#macos)
  - [Debian](#debian)
- [Installation](#installation)
- [Development](#development)
  - [Future](#future)
  - [History](#history)
- [Credits](#credits)
- [License](#license)

## Features

### All OS
- Install [Arduino IDE](https://www.arduino.cc/en/Main/Software)
- Install [Atom](https://atom.io/)
  - Install [atom-material-syntax-dark](https://atom.io/themes/atom-material-syntax-dark)
  - Install [atom-material-ui](https://atom.io/themes/atom-material-ui)
  - Install [editorconfig](https://atom.io/packages/editorconfig)
  - Install [file-icons](https://atom.io/packages/file-icons)
  - Install [minimap](https://atom.io/packages/minimap)
  - Install [pdf-view](https://atom.io/packages/pdf-view)
  - Install [svg-preview](https://atom.io/packages/svg-preview)
  - Install [zentabs](https://atom.io/packages/zentabs)
  - Update `~/.atom/config.cson`
- Install [Audacity](http://www.audacityteam.org/)
- Install [Blender](https://www.blender.org/)
- Install [cURL](https://curl.haxx.se/)
- Install [Docker CE](https://www.docker.com/community-edition)
- Install [FileZilla](https://filezilla-project.org/)
- Install [GIMP](https://www.gimp.org/)
- Install [Git](https://git-scm.com/)
- Install [Google Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome/browser/desktop/index.html)
  - Add [aXe](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/axe/lhdoppojpmngadmnindnejefpokejbdd)
  - Add [Click&Clean](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/clickclean/ghgabhipcejejjmhhchfonmamedcbeod)
  - Add [HTTPS Everywhere](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/https-everywhere/gcbommkclmclpchllfjekcdonpmejbdp)
  - Add [Lighthouse](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/lighthouse/blipmdconlkpinefehnmjammfjpmpbjk)
  - Add [ScriptSafe](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/scriptsafe/oiigbmnaadbkfbmpbfijlflahbdbdgdf)
  - Add [Scrollbar Customizer](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/scrollbar-customizer/flffekjijpabhjgpoapooggncnmcjopa)
  - Add [Stylish](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylish-custom-themes-for/fjnbnpbmkenffdnngjfgmeleoegfcffe)
    - TODO: Add https://userstyles.org/ List
  - Add [uBlock Origin](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ublock-origin/cjpalhdlnbpafiamejdnhcphjbkeiagm)
  - Add [Wappalyzer](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/wappalyzer/gppongmhjkpfnbhagpmjfkannfbllamg)
  - Add [XPath Helper](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/xpath-helper/hgimnogjllphhhkhlmebbmlgjoejdpjl)
- Install [HTTrack](https://www.httrack.com/)
- Install [Inkscape](https://inkscape.org/en/)
- Install [LibreOffice](https://www.libreoffice.org/)
- Install [Mozilla Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/)
- Install [Mozilla Thunderbird](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/)
- Install [Node.js LTS](https://nodejs.org/en/)
- Install [OpenVPN](https://openvpn.net/)
- Install [Opera](https://www.opera.com/)
- Install [Python2](https://www.python.org/)
- Install [qBittorrent](https://www.qbittorrent.org/)
- Install [Slack](https://slack.com/)
- Install [Steam](http://store.steampowered.com/about/)
- Install [Vagrant](https://www.vagrantup.com/)
- Install [VirtualBox](https://www.virtualbox.org/)
- Install [VLC](https://www.videolan.org/vlc/index.html)

### Windows
- Install [7zip](https://chocolatey.org/packages/7zip)
- Install [adobereader](https://chocolatey.org/packages/adobereader)
- Install [avastfreeantivirus](https://chocolatey.org/packages/avastfreeantivirus)
- Install [choco](https://chocolatey.org/)
- Install [rsync](https://chocolatey.org/packages/rsync)
- Install [malwarebytes](https://chocolatey.org/packages/malwarebytes)
- Install [putty](https://chocolatey.org/packages/putty)
- Add `C:\Program Files\Git\usr\bin` to `%PATH%`. See [git-usr-bin.txt](data/git-usr-bin.txt)

### macOS
- Install [adobe-acrobat-reader](https://caskroom.github.io/search?q=adobe-acrobat-reader)
- Install [brew](https://brew.sh/)

### Debian
- Install [adapta-gtk-theme](https://github.com/adapta-project/adapta-gtk-theme)
- Install [command-not-found](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/command-not-found)
- Install [filezilla-theme-papirus](https://github.com/PapirusDevelopmentTeam/papirus-filezilla-themes)
- Install [gist](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/gist)
- Install [imagemagick](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/imagemagick)
- Install [keepassx](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/keepassx)
- Install [libreoffice-style-papirus](https://github.com/PapirusDevelopmentTeam/papirus-libreoffice-theme)
- Install [lynis](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/lynis)
- Install [network-manager-gnome](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/network-manager-gnome)
- Install [nginx](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/nginx)
- Install [ntp](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/ntp)
- Install [papirus-icon-theme](https://github.com/PapirusDevelopmentTeam/papirus-icon-theme)
- Install [pavucontrol](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/pavucontrol)
- Install [postgresql](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/postgresql)
- Install [pulseaudio](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/pulseaudio)
- Install [qpdfview](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/qpdfview)
- Install [resolvconf](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/resolvconf)
- Install [tails-installer](https://tails.boum.org/blueprint/bootstrapping/installer/)
- Install [task-lxde-desktop](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/task-lxde-desktop)
- Install [wmctrl](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/wmctrl)
- Install [yubikey-personalization](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/yubikey-personalization)
- Install [yubikey-personalization-gui](https://packages.debian.org/stretch/yubikey-personalization-gui)

## Installation

### Windows
Start [Command Prompt as an Administrator](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc947813) or [PowerShell](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/) and run:
```
bitsadmin /transfer t https://github.com/tuxredux/setupmyos/raw/master/bin/installer.bat %temp%\i.bat & %temp%\i.bat
```

### macOS
Start [Terminal](https://support.apple.com/en-us/guide/terminal/welcome) and run:
```
curl -fsSL https://github.com/tuxredux/setupmyos/raw/master/bin/installer.sh | bash
```

### Debian
```
wget -qO- https://github.com/tuxredux/setupmyos/raw/master/bin/installer.sh | bash
```
